structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: Each jailer shall have the custody, rule and charge of the jail in his county and of all persons in the jail and shall keep the same himself or by his deputy or deputies. Where the jail admits the residence of the same therein he or one (1) of his deputies may reside in the jail.
law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 385, sec. 27, effective July 1, 1982. -- Amended 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 147, secs. 1 and 2. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2229.
